Define Documentation

#define BOUND_PROB ( x   )     do { if (x<0) x=0; else if (x>1) x=1; } while (0)

simple macro to bound a probability.

it is a single statement, with the caller expected to supply the trailing semicolon. the paramater is a variable whose value should be bounded to lie between 0 and 1.
